scripts.postinstall: echo 'Setting up Prisma...' && (../../node_modules/.bin/prisma generate --schema=../../packages/db/schema.prisma || echo 'Prisma generation skipped') && node -e "try { const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const p = path.join(process.cwd(), '../..', 'node_modules/@prisma/client'); const n = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules/@prisma'); if (!fs.existsSync(n)) fs.mkdirSync(n, { recursive: true }); const c = path.join(process.cwd(), 'node_modules/@prisma/client'); if (!fs.existsSync(c) && fs.existsSync(p)) fs.symlinkSync(p, c, 'dir'); } catch(e) { console.log('Symlink creation skipped'); }"
